Package app.warzone.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
app.warzone.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Warzone game, with methods for managing player actions and orders.

      public void addCountryToHolderList(Country p_country, int p_armyCount)
      Add a country to the player's holding list with the specified number of armies.
      Parameters:
      p_country - The country to add.
      p_armyCount - The number of armies to assign to the country.

    • next_order

      public Order next_order()
      Get the next order in the player's list of given orders.
      Returns:
      The next order to execute or null if there are no more orders.
